means: “鉴于…”：正式文件的介绍性陈述，开场白

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些连词或副词均含"但是，可是，然而，而"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: but, however, still, yet, nevertheless, while, whereas
means: but ： 口语常用词，语气较强，泛指与前述情况相反。
however ： 表转折关系，语气稍弱于but，连接性也弱一些，因而常作插入语。
still ： 语气强，多用于肯定句或疑问句。指尽管作出让步，采取措施或表示反对，但情况仍然如故，无所改变。
yet ： 常用于否定句，语气比still稍强。指不管作出多大努力或让步，仍达不到预期的结果。
nevertheless ： 指尽管作出完全让步，也不会发生任何影响。
while ： 表对比，一般可与whereas换用，但程度弱一些。
whereas ： 表对比，一般可与while互换。

sentence.Network_en: Whereas West Germans drink wine, their Eastern cousins prefer Schnapps.
sentence.Network_cn: 西德人喝葡萄酒，而他们东德的兄弟姐妹则喜欢喝杜松子酒。

sentence.Network_en: Some of the studies show positive results, whereas others do not.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一些研究结果令人满意，然而其他的则不然。

sentence.Network_en: They want a house, whereas we would rather live in a flat.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们想要一座房子, 而我们宁愿住在一套房间里.

未分类 - - Nicolas’ Blog - Upholstery ... whenever ad. 随时 whereas conj. 面，其实，既然 whether conj. 无论，不管.
...st choice for 72% of those in the 15-19 age group, whereas（然而） less than half of the teenagers in the Uk wear ot.

list.abs: Wise men love truth , whereas fools shun it ., 智者热爱真理 , 愚者回避真理.
鉴于条款(Whereas Clause)主要是用来说明当事人双方签订合同的目的和转让技术的合法性质。whereas clause ：说明条款学习网考 …
在青岛英语培训学校学习的同学,会对一些引导词有不明白的地方,现在总结如下引导词: 1.while, whereas 引导对比从句如:While the teenage population in the.
mainly by the glycolysis pathway whereas resistant varieties depend more on the pentose phosphate pathway ., 显然敏感品种的呼吸主要通过糖酵解途径 , 而抗性品种比较依赖戊糖磷酸途径.

means.word_mean: 由于,因为,既然,另一方面,虽然

entry.def: You use whereas to introduce a comment which contrasts with what is said in the main clause.

example.ex: Pensions are linked to inflation, whereas they should be linked to the cost of living...
example.tran: 养老金与通货膨胀挂钩，然而它们其实应该和生活费用挂钩。

example.ex: Whereas the population of working age increased by 1 million between 1981 and 1986, today it is barely growing.
example.tran: 1981年到1986年间适龄工作人口增长了100万，而现如今该人口数却几乎没有增长。

auth_sentence.content: Whereas all you have is conspiracy theories and blogs.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whereas all you have is conspiracy theories and blogs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whereas all you have is conspiracy theories and blogs.

auth_sentence.content: Some acid dyes are toxic whereas others are nontoxic.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some acid dyes are toxic whereas others are nontoxic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some acid dyes are toxic whereas others are nontoxic.

auth_sentence.content: Science is self-correcting whereas religion lives in constant denial.
auth_sentence.res_content: Science is self-correcting whereas religion lives in constant denial.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Science is self-correcting whereas religion lives in constant denial.

Sentence.sentence: Whereas language probably traces back at least 80.
At the Polytechnic I'd have to do 35 hours a week, 20 teaching and 15 administration, whereas the Pistoia school is only asking for 30 hours teaching.
Yes, whereas with the Polytechnic position, I'd be stuck in the school all day

means.word_mean: （用以比较或对比两个事实）但是, 然而,尽管

sentences.en: Some praise him, whereas others condemn him.
sentences.cn: 有些人赞扬他, 而有些人谴责他。

jushi.english: Some praise him, whereas others condemn him.
jushi.chinese: 有些人赞扬他,而有些人谴责他。

jushi.english: Whereas the amendment is enthusiastically supported by a large majority in the Senate, its fate is doubtful in the House.
jushi.chinese: 尽管此修正案在参议院得到了多数议员的热情支持,但在众议院其命运很难确定。
